app.name: Project Management
app.description: Create Children tickets that all link back to a parent ticket.
app.installation_instructions: Requires a text field for the project id. This is so views can be built.
app.long_description: When viewing a ticket that is not currently in a project a button will be displayed to make a project from this ticket. After clicking the button you will be given the option to create a single ticket or bulk ticket. When clicking either of those buttons the current tickets ticket form, ticket fields, requester, and description will be copied to the ticket form in the app. Creating a single ticket will let you select one group. The bulk ticket will have a multi select box which will allow your to use cntl click to select multiple groups. When sumbiting the app ticket form a ticket will be created for each group selected and a list of tickets created will be displayed.

Custom_Field_ID.label: Custom Field ID
Custom_Field_ID.helpText: You can find the Custom Field ID on the ticket field edit page

prependSubject.label: Prepend Subject Line
prependSubject.helpText: Prepend the subject line of the children tickets with the project ID

appendSubject.label: Append Subject Line
appendSubject.helpText: Append the the subject line of the children tickets with the project ID

prefillAssignee.label: Prefill assignee and group
prefillAssignee.helpText: Prefill the assignee and group fields in the creation form, taken over from the current ticket.

defaultTicketType.label: Default ticket type
defaultTicketType.helpText: Instead of taking over the ticket type from the current ticket, use this type by default. Empty (to take over), or one of: question, incident, problem, or task.

defaultTicketPriority.label: Default ticket priority
defaultTicketPriority.helpText: Instead of taking over the ticket priority from the current ticket, use this priority by default. Empty (to take over), or one of: low, normal, high, urgent.

user.btnCurrComm: Make a Project from this ticket

form.addTicketno: Enter a list of ticket id's separated with commas
form.subject: Subject
